metadata.title: CVE-2022-1706 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - medium
metadata.description: A vulnerability was found in Ignition where ignition configs are accessiblefrom unprivileged containers in VMs running on VMware products. This issueis only relevant in user environments where the Ignition config containssecrets. The highest threat from this vulnerability is to dataconfidentiality. Possible workaround is to not put secrets in the Ignitionconfig.

criterions.comment: ignition package in mantic is affected and may need fixing.
